item.title: WhitePaperInvestigative IntelligenceAllThe Impact of the Cybercriminal Landscape Against FinanceThe financial sector remains one of the most attractive targets for cybercriminals due to the value of the data it holds and the critical role it plays in global economic stability. Between late 2024 and November 2025, threat actors increasingly leveraged social engineering, ransomware, and third-party compromise to exploit financial organisations, often resulting in significant financial, operational, and reputational impact. This whitepaper examines how these evolving tactics have shaped the cyber threat landscape for the finance sector over this period.January 5, 202612 min readRead more
